title: New: Superheart – Count On Me
body:
This debut from **Superheart**, the new project of London’s Luke Batt, reminds me of the romanticism of early Washed Out.

I had this on repeat whilst walking round a deserted Dalston at 11.30pm last night, and it just clicked. There’s just such a gorgeously, ethereal energy to _Count On Me_ and the effortless way in which it dances, that makes it so damn addictive. Check it out below.
